posts.post_content:
Hi all, I'm fairly new here but was looking to get started with some low grade (raw or graded) T206 Brooklyn cards. My grandfather passed recently and grew up in in Brooklyn so I figured I'm going to start there and see what I come up with!

I'm a long time modern collector just now dabbling in Pre-War cards. I kind of fell in love with them when I came across a bunch in person at a local antique shop. I plan on making a few purchases over there this weekend.

Thanks for your time.

[url]willbbc@gmail.com[/url].

I have a few available on my website.    Click the banner to get there...

[URL="http://cassidyssportscards.webs.com/t20619091911.htm"][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/CassidysSportscardsBanner.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/DocMarshallT206Piedmont.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/HarryMcIntyreT206SweetCaporal_Brook.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/KaiserWilhelmT206Piedmont_HandsatCh.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i222.photobucket.com/albums/dd47/BlueDevilSportscards/T206%201909-1911/TimJordan_PortraitT206SweetCaporalS.jpg[/IMG]

Awesome--going to order the Wilhelm. Thanks.

Still looking for others.
Thanks for the purchase.   Look for the card to arrive later this week.

Bell hands above head - Fair/Good - $10
Burch Batting - brown hindu w/ tape on back - Very Poor - $100
Dunn - vg/ex-ex (nice card) - $50
Hunter - good - $13
Lennox - vg/ex - $40
McElveen - vg+ - $32

Orders under $100 please add $3 for s/h.
Take 'em all without Burch = $135 ppd
Take 'em all with Burch = $225 ppd.

Regards,
Scott Levy
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

Can you shoot me scans of the following?

Hunter - good - $13
Lennox - vg/ex - $40
McElveen - vg+ - $32
